review: This is my second Chromecast and I love it.  I have a smart TV but I usually end up watching most of my content through my Chromecast expect for 4K contents.  As far as I know, Chromecast does not have the ability to stream 4K videos, but its okay because there aren't too many 4K contents to stream at the moment anyways.  As mentioned this is my second Chromecast.  I lost my first one moving furniture around, but without hesitation ordered a second one after 1 hour of searching.  If I ever find my first, that'll be fine too as I have more TVs around the house.  Also, Google has couple of offers for people that own a Chromecast.  I got three months of Hulu, three months of Google Play Music, 2 free movie rentals from Google Play, some Google Play Store credit, and much more. And one more thing, SOME offers are able to be stacked, as in owning more than one Chromecast can get you some of Google's offers twice. It has definitely paid for itself.  I recommend this product 100%.
